name: Absol
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: It appears when it senses an impending natural disaster. As a result, it was mistaken as a doom bringer.

abilities.name: Cursed Eyes
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench, you may move 3 damage counters from 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon to another of his or her Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mach Claw
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Resistance.
